channel.title: Prices
channel.description:
hi, i need some help with changing prices for items on my server, could someone please tell me?
zenmen

item.title: Prices
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

[quote=“Fr33b1e, post:2, topic:112276”]Alright, if you want to change prices, go into your item.cfg, and after all the bonuses, you’ll see like 7778952.55476 (example). Now, lets say you find a whip, and want to change the shop price to 5M.

Process:
Get a calculator, and take 5000000 divided by 1.26875, and you’ll get like 3904000 or something, replace the current number with that.

Save, compile, run.[/quote]

to add to that you know a file called itemlist.java??

look at what it says !!! zomg -.-

public class ItemList {
public int itemId;
public String itemName;
public String itemDescription;
public double ShopValue;
public double LowAlch;
public double HighAlch;
public int[] Bonuses = new int[100];

public ItemList(int _itemId) {
	itemId = _itemId;
}

}

it goes by order so yeah, thats how it is in items.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Prices
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Alright, if you want to change prices, go into your item.cfg, and after all the bonuses, you’ll see like 7778952.55476 (example). Now, lets say you find a whip, and want to change the shop price to 5M.

Process:
Get a calculator, and take 5000000 divided by 1.26875, and you’ll get like 3904000 or something, replace the current number with that.

Save, compile, run.

Read full topic
